topic.title: Device Latency

body.p: This section is currently marked as Internal so that it won't appear in the first version of the HWS. It contains outdated information that will be updated at a later date for subsequent releases of the HWS.Device latency information consists of measured results for end to end datapaths, per datapath segment estimated latencies based on simulations and analysis that has been correlated to measurements, and latencies through the packet buffers (ODUk Switch and CPB).
